org.jmesa.util
Class ItemUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.jmesa.util.ItemUtils

public class ItemUtils
extends Object

General utilities to process the Collecton of Beans or the Collection of Maps. Most methods wrap or add value to the commons Beanutils.

Since:
2.1
Author:
Jeff Johnston
